questions.question: Electricity, gas and water supply comes under which sector?
Short-term finance is usually for a period ranging up to?
What is the means of subsidies?
options: payment by government for purchase of goods and services
payment made by business enterprises to factors of production
payment made by companies to shareholders
payment made by the government to business enterprises, without buying any goods and services
questions.correctAnswer: payment made by the government to business enterprises, without buying any goods and services
